title: The Truth Behind James Dean's Death
fullTitle: The Truth Behind James Dean's Death (2005)
plot: The ultimate documentary on the death of James Dean. Accident reconstructionists via computer ploted maps and the laws of physics have recreated the accident with such precision that when the ultimate crash is recreated the crashed car lands within in mere inches of the original crash scene and site. Includes interviews with those persons last to see and speak with James. interviews of James Dean weeks before his untimely jdeath. National Geographic assisted with transformation of my Beck 550 Porsche Spyder to a mirror image of the infamous car that gave Porsche its mystique including the "the curse".
